Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett predicts the Milwaukee Brewers to win against the St. Louis Cardinals on Tuesday, September 3, 2024, based on Aaron Civale's recent performance and the Brewers' ability to muster hits and walks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The St. Louis Cardinals won 6-5 and 14-7 in the final two games of their series against the Yankees over the weekend.
The Milwaukee Brewers have won the first three games of their series against the Cincinnati Reds, but lost 4-3 in Sunday's finale.
Others: The game will be played at American Family Field at 7:40 pm, with Sonny Gray starting for the Cardinals and Aaron Civale for the Brewers.
